1.0.name: wordpress/agreement
1.0.description:
The Agreement plugin helps to create pop-up licence agreement or term to use before download any thing from post or page. It will give freedom to change text in pop-up. After activation of plugin in post/page add file from "Add Media", then change editor type from Visual to text and give id to that media file. Id will be like this id="agreement". Your link will be like 'id="agreement" href="http://yourdmain.com/home/wp2/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/pdf.pdf"', Now save post/page. This plugin works for single item in a page.

Requirements

  • WordPress 3.5.1 or greater
  • PHP 5.2.6 or greater (5.3 recommended)
  • MySQL 4.1.2 or greater (5.x recommended)
